regex.name: conector_youtube
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re,requests,base64,shutil,random from kodi_six import xbmc,xbmcgui,xbmcaddon,xbmcvfs from six.moves import urllib_request import six def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): pasta = requests.get('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Cristalazul/Cristalazul.io/main/CONECTORES/youtube', verify=False).text return six.ensure_str(pasta)
